content:
I believe piazza has an option for emailing students to notify them of your post.
A post where all students are notified is called a notification. Also, each user decides how often they want to be told about updates; I'm sent email about twice a day no matter how many posts are made. So if your class is being spammed every time you post, either you or they aren't using the system correctly (I think....)
author: Russell Impagliazzo
